roleset.name: having low blood oxygen
roleset.note: HYPOXEMIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8 (from hypoxemic.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: However , if she-1 continues *-1 to be hypoxemic and / or develops hemodynamic compromise , we may need to start empiric anticoagulation .
